types.html:
ne pas être la mer à boire

  1. to not be an insurmountable task, an endeavour too large to handle, to not be so hard

See also

[edit]
  • fin du monde
trans: to not be an insurmountable task, an endeavour too large to handle, to not be so hard
to not be an insurmountable task, an endeavour too large to handle, to not be so hard
